programme.title: The Titan Games S2
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by host and executive producer Dwayne Johnson. In these Western division battles we see Robbie Rodriguez go up against Wayne Skivington for the men while Lindsey Hamm takes on Jamara Garrett for the women. They will compete on obstacles such as Nuts & Bolts, Chain Linked, Lunar Impact and Kick Out. Winners will move on to face reigning Titan’s on Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. Cari Champion and Alex Mendez serve as commentators.

programme.title: The Titan Games S2
programme.desc: Superbowl champion Victor Cruz and professional stuntwoman and “American Ninja Warrior” star Jessie Graff return along with four other top competitors for one last shot at redemption. The contenders must face off in a brand-new three-way battle before advancing to a classic head-to-head competition. The last competitors standing must defeat the reigning Titans on Mt. Olympus to advance to the championship round. Dwayne Johnson serves as Host while Cari Champion and Alex Mendez serve as commentators.

programme.title: The Titan Games S2
programme.desc: The competition moves to the Eastern Region as new competitors push their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by host and executive producer Dwayne Johnson. In this episode, competitors will compete in a best of three competition where the winner will move on to battle a Pro-Athlete Titan on Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The top female competitor will face Olympic gold-medal winning snowboarder Hannah Teter, while the top man will advance to compete against five-time UFC champion Tyron Woodley. Cari Champion and Alex Mendez serve as commentators.

programme.desc: When Philly Phil starts feeling like an outcast at Westley because of his poor performance in a Field Day event he transfers to a science magnet school. programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1

However upon hearing about the dangerous way in which the auditorium was destroyed Eddie's parents become unreasonably overprotective of their son to the point where Eddie must decide between quitting the musical or standing up to his parents.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now broken out of mind control, Layla goes undercover with the gang, hiding the fact that she’s no longer being controlled. Rafaela puts Layla’s driving to the test in a wild race against a mystery driver, then takes the rest of the crew hostage just days before Rafaela's dastardly plot.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now in Rafaela’s custody, the crew works together to break Echo out to retrieve the hauler. Echo makes it into the jungle and must battle a mind-controlled Ms. Nowhere using everything she’s learned about spying and survival from the very woman who's out to get her. Meanwhile, Rafaela enlists Frostee to help her develop a non-exploding version of the mind control formula before her plan goes into motion at the favela race.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight

And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Olivia

programme.title: Olivia

programme.title: Walking Through The Village

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives to the fiery provinces of Sichuan and Hunan and this time he's joined by celebrated chef and author Fuchsia Dunlop who is an expert on the region.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is in Fujian - a place with a long history of migration where the movement of people left an enduring mark that manifested in its food and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw heads to the home of Cantonese cuisine - Hong Kong and Guangdong to discover the regional cuisine that spread to all corners of the world.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw's last stop is the very special Hainan Island - a balmy, tropical island and Adam's ancestral home.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam goes in search of the best seafood that Singapore has to offer. His journey begins inside the Marina Bay Sands resort complex where many celebrity chefs have opened eateries.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw continues his search for seafood inspiration by heading to the famous Newton Food Centre. He gives a masterclass on how to line up a seafood feast like no other.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw goes in search of Singapore's best vegetable dishes, kicking off with a traditional breakfast at Singapore Zoo, including kaya toast with half-cooked eggs and coffee.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: In his quest to find the best ingredients for his banquet dinner, Adam Liaw visits a colourful fruit and veg market in Geylang and a Michelin-starred restaurant.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: In between some cocktail-tasting pit stops, Adam Liaw discovers some of the finest desserts in Singapore, from homemade Peranakan sweet treats to a sophisticated dessert bar.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw gathers what he has learned over the past few weeks to serve up an impressive five-course banquet dinner to some distinguished guests, including his mother.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Experience Namibia’s wild 1,000km coast! Where arid deserts meet stubborn life, this film captures a grandiose, fragile spectacle of nature thriving against all odds. Witness the impossible beauty!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now broken out of mind control, Layla goes undercover with the gang, hiding the fact that she’s no longer being controlled. The crew is shocked to discover that revered martyr Rafaela Moreno is still alive and is the mastermind behind the mind control plot. Rafaela puts Layla’s driving to the test in a wild race against a mystery driver, then takes the rest of the crew hostage just days before Rafaela's dastardly plot.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Now in Rafaela’s custody, the crew works together to break Echo out to retrieve the hauler. Echo makes it into the jungle and must battle a mind-controlled Ms. Nowhere using everything she’s learned about spying and survival from the very woman who's out to get her. Meanwhile, Rafaela enlists Frostee to help her develop a non-exploding version of the mind control formula before her plan goes into motion at the favela race.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Echo and Ms. Nowhere bust Cisco, Frostee, and Gary out of their cell. But Rafaela has already mind controlled Tony and Layla and taken them to drive for her in the favela race, allowing her to release her mind control formula on the crowd!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim must surrender to Bular and unlock the Killahead Bridge to save kidnapped Blinky and promises Claire that he will get her brother back.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim yearns to save Claires brother Meanwhile Strickler takes a field trip to find help in his quest for power

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim is nominated for Spring Fling King Meanwhile Strickler brings Angor Rot to Arcadia so the Troll assassin can meet his prey.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged
programme.desc: After springing a coolant leak Dozer overheats and must dip in the faroff restorative mineral baths and learn to keep his temper in check along the way

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: The PALs make plans for the Valentine's Day dance, then pivot to scare off a group of raiders who've come to rob the headmaster's vault.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: The depleted team flies through space and enters a region of pure darkness, with no sign of life and seemingly no way out

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Circumstantial evidence has Birch certain Raffi's fallen in with a bad crowd. His frequent absences, new friends and secretive behaviour point to one thing for Birch who has a hard time convincing her friends. A note, its content misconstrued, finally convinces everyone of Raffi's dire predicament.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: An attempt to quell Liam's manic energy throws Birch into conflict. Does she continue helping her hyperactive cousin learn to relax or does she pull him into the school's Manga Slam? Will Liam become too relaxed or bring a never-before-seen energy to Cosmos High's stage?

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: After Birch watches a late night mockumentary on TV about aliens among us, she becomes a big ball of paranoia as she misinterprets her schoolmates' head twitches, hand gestures and overall comportment. What she doesn't know is they're planning a surprise party for her and are acting all mysterious around her.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Liam is asked to help out the soccer team when an injury sidelines Raffi. Immediately thrilled to be part of the team — any team — Liam's joy turns to humiliation when he realizes the other players want him to be the mascot, not an actual player.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Buttercup and Daisy find some stars in flowertot garden. They think they have fallen out of the sky and try to return them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: The twins are sure they have seen fairies in the garden and set out on a hunt to prove it to Fifi. Will they find any?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia and Francine both volunteer to be classroom pet monitor, so the teacher, Mrs. Hogenmuller, tells them each to explain why they deserve the job. Francine initially wins over the class with the help of her charming cat, Gwendolyn, but when it's revealed that Francine is afraid of the class lizard, everyone is happy for Olivia to take over the job - especially Francine!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: When school is let out early due to snow, Julian and Francine come over to Olivia's house. Olivia has the perfect game for them – Hotel! She transforms her house into a make-believe hotel. But then some strange things start to happen. Does the hotel have ghosts, or is Ian just playing tricks on them?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After losing their mission materials in quicksand, Tony decides to channel Dom and Blend in to get intel from the people of Rio. Unfortunately it's more difficult than he expected, and Tony and his crew are picked up by a group of favela gangsters in a neighborhood that worships a mysterious young female martyr. The crew is relieved to find that Layla is in charge of the gangsters - until she orders the gangsters to dispose of them!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony is convinced that Layla is deep undercover and tries to talk to her alone to get through to her. Meanwhile, the crew investigates the gang’s production of the mysterious formula from the tattoo. When Frostee discovers that the product of the formula is unstable and will explode, Tony has to save Layla, who is driving a whole truck of it!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: The gang breaks into Stricklers office for clues to Killahead Bridge but ends up releasing a monster into school and Strickler reveals his true form.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jims Trollhunting life and his high school life collide when Claire becomes a target for Goblin revenge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation

programme.title: Para Kang Papa Mo
programme.desc: In the vibrant 1990s Philippines, the infectious trend of village-level dance contests echoes through communities. Young talents Anton, Ric, and Jose are at the heart of it. Yet, envy lurks in the shadows, a malicious force conspiring to dismantle their dreams.

programme.title: Hindi Tayo Pwede

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: K (JC Santos) and Cream (Yassi Pressman) believe they're soulmates. When K finds out that he's dying, he thinks setting her free would be best for her.

programme.title: Exit Point
programme.desc: Because of prison overcrowding, 12 inmates were sent to an island where they must fight and survive for freedom.

programme.title: Working Beks
programme.desc: Five gay men from different walks of life are confronted with important choices that could change everything for them.

programme.title: Bukas May Umaga
programme.desc: Bukas May Umaga is a story of triumph in struggling for inner freedom and in search for justice of women violently victimized by raped.

programme.title: Alindog Ni Barbara
programme.desc: Though born twins, Barbara and Elena are worlds apart, Elena is bright and vigorous, while Barbara is mentally retarded. Upon seeing her dear friend's killing, Barbara discovers an unusual and menacing power she possesses: the power to annihiliate with her eyes.

programme.title: Ang Cute Ng Ina Mo
programme.desc: The story revolves around Georgia,a Filipina patis manufacturer and a mother who is finally reunited with her long-lost daughter after 20 years of separation.

programme.title: Tumbok
programme.desc: Cristine Reyes plays the role of Grace, wife to Carlo Aquino's character named, Ronnie, who just moved in an inherited condominium unit from the father of his husband which turn out to be hunted with ghosts. Their mishaps and misfortunes follow as they live there.

programme.title: Habangbuhay
programme.desc: A sheltered girl, who grew up in a very protective family, is asking a boy to fight for their love. If only he was not too consumed by his own battles.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: D' Uragons
programme.desc: Sherlock, a private detective helps Orot, a street-smart fellow who is caught in a dilemma. The two soon discover the syndicate behind the robbery.

programme.title: Pangarap Ko Ang Ibigin Ka
programme.desc: Although Rafael (Christopher de Leon) feels that he is not yet ready for another commitments, Alexis (Regine Velasquez) feels that he is the one she has been looking for.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Final Answer
programme.desc: Nino is a self-starter who now lives a comfortable life. Meanwhile, Joanna is a cheerful person who has made a career out of joining all sorts of contests. When Joanna applied as Nino's assistant, he noticed the luck Joanna brought him so he decided to hire her.

programme.title: The Waltons S3 E01 - The Conflict (Part I)

programme.desc: When a former ranch investigator and government official returns to help the team with a new experiment, it leads to a shocking revelation.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: It's one of the most infamous crimes in American history: the gruesome murder of a young beauty, unsolved for decades. There's a long line of suspects, each more mysterious than the next.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from a valley in Peru with over 250 hidden pyramids to an ancient Greek city with 4800-year-old ruins to Egypt's famous Giza Plateau.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: Ever taken medical advice from a cigarette commercial? There was a time when any and all 'cures' could be sold to the public indiscriminately.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: As winter descends on Oak Island and clues continue to be uncovered, the fellowship makes a final bold effort to find the treasure before operations cease for the winter.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In 1983, underdog company Tonka sets out to bring a game-changing toy from Japan to America: the transformable robot. But they're soon confronted by industry giant, Hasbro, who has its own competing line.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For centuries archaeologists have been obsessed with locating ancient cities lost to time. How does a once-thriving community become a lost city? And if they are found, what secrets they might reveal?

programme.title: Joe Reyes... Mahirap Patayin, Masamang Buhayin
programme.desc: Action star Roi Vinzon plays honest cop Joe Reyes. On a surveillance mission, he is able to record government Undersecretary Ruiz offering protection to foreigners regarding their illegal activities in exchange for money on video.

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.

programme.title: Init Sa Magdamag (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a modern tale about woman. Her many moods. Her many faces. No matter who she was, happiness was not destined to be hers as all the events of her past eventually caught up with her.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: Regalo
programme.desc: Tragedy had struck newlyweds, Daniel Fernando and Sheila Ysrael, when Daniel was paralyzed. Sheila was soon seduced by Dan Fernadez, a household help.

programme.title: Akyat Bahay Gang
programme.desc: Lito Lapid was working in a carnival. He learned to do many things to meet both ends. He was a good man but circumstances tried to direct him on the wrong path.

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Bikini Watch (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.desc: Renowned financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies and tactics.

programme.desc: When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Tim Rex In Space
programme.desc: Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. // Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. // The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
programme.desc: Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks! // Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie’s bathtub float. It literally “floats” away!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora finds out that her Abuela never had a quinceańera and throws her a super-secret surprise party with a special dress, tiara, and shoes! // Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story for Story Time, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: Tim Rex In Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

programme.title: Tim Rex In Space
programme.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

programme.title: Tim Rex In Space
programme.desc: Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle teaches the children about Chinese New Year and together they make a wonderful dragon costume..

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family spend the day jumping in different types of puddles, but Peppa thinks one type is still the best puddle in the world!

programme.title: Smallville S2 6
programme.desc: Because the farm is in financial trouble, Martha asks her estranged father, William Clark (GEORGE COE), for help.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 10
programme.desc: The spotlight shines on 20 of the Worlds Dumbest Performers. From an underwear clad girl giving a sobriety test, to amateur firework technicians, plus a funeral home Christmas greeting that will send shivers down your spine - these dumb performers shine in the roles they were born to play. Plus, awesome commentary from our cast of comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Friends S7 7
programme.desc: Ross discovers that his dissertation is in a section of the library where students go to have sex.Chandler's ex-girlfriend Janice manipulates Monica and Chandler into inviting her the wedding.Rachel and Phoebe meddle in Joey's relationship with Erin.

programme.title: Friends S7 8
programme.desc: Chandler's irrational fear of dogs causes problems when Phoebe brings home a cute canine. Rachel's assistant gives her a Thanksgiving surprise--a kiss.

programme.title: Friends S7 9
programme.desc: Monica becomes popular with her neighbors because of her homemade candy. Phoebe decides to learn to ride a bicycle. Rachel gets into trouble for dating her assistant.

programme.title: Friends S7 10
programme.desc: Ross dresses up as the Holiday Armadillo and, with Monica, Chandler and Joey's help, teaches Ben about Chanukah. Phoebe worries that Rachel prefers living with Joey.

programme.title: Friends S7 11
programme.desc: Chandler and Rachel can't help eating the irresistible cheesecakes intended for a neighbor. Phoebe's former boyfriend returns for one night only, but Joey could ruin the romance. Monica plots revenge on her cousin's wedding day.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q hit some bad reception while working a desk and then head to a park to ask strangers for advice on their questionable life choices. Plus, the loser goes to a water aerobics class, but ends up drowning in shame.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe use a two-way mirror to get each other to crack and then hit a grocery to see who can sell the most samples. Plus, the loser gets taken for a ride that ends with a visit to the Statue of Liberty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get stuck in a grocery showdown, beg strangers for questionable quotes, and spew financial tips that are anything but sound. Plus, the loser earns a time-out for his outrageous antics at a kid's play space.

programme.title: Full House S1 22
programme.desc: D.J. takes advantage of Joey's gullible nature by convincing him that she is sick so she can skip school and sneak down to the mall to get Stacey Q's autograph.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll reveal the best camping hacks, and see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 03
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test a variety of hacks to find out which work best for shining your shoes, avoiding a soda can explosion, and putting wine in a blender. Plus, they'll find the most efficient hacks for home maintenance, and teach you which hacks will help combat any party animal.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 04
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin compete to discover the best hacks for chopping a watermelon, removing stickers from a locker and cooking pizzas. Plus, they'll prepare you for your next tailgate and for any encounter with a walking disaster.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes on a 24-hour training course with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Comic superstar Steve Carell takes on the role of Agent Maxwell Smart and Anne Hathaway steps into the shoes of sexy Agent 99 as the two superspies out to save the world from the nefarious forces of KAOS in this romp based on the classic television show created by Mel Brooks and Buck Henry.

programme.title: Ghosts of Saigon
programme.desc: As the Vietnam War neared its chaotic end, thousands of children were evacuated. Some arrived in Australia through Operation Babylift. This documentary traces the emotional journey of those adopted into Australian families.

programme.title: Australia In Colour - Episode 4
programme.desc: Between 1960 and 1970 we see a Decade of Protest as the nation finds its voice. The Vietnam War is a hot button issue and inequality between black and white, and women and men, become mainstream issues.

programme.title: The Way We Wore - Episode 3
programme.desc: In this final episode, Celeste Barber tracks the ascent of Australia's fashion sector, tracing its roots from early bespoke seamstresses to the multi-billion-dollar international enterprise it is today.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 3
programme.desc: The multi-award winning Four Corners returns for another year of powerhouse investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, exposing scandals, triggering inquiries, leading debate and holding power to account for 65 years.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight - Episode 15
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 5
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Tom Gleeson's Secrets of the Australian Museum
programme.desc: For the first time, cameras go behind the scenes at the Australian Museum. Join Gold Logie winner Tom Gleeson as he discovers the labs, treasures and action leading up to their biggest exhibition ever.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 6
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: The Way We Wore - Episode 3
programme.desc: In this final episode, Celeste Barber tracks the ascent of Australia's fashion sector, tracing its roots from early bespoke seamstresses to the multi-billion-dollar international enterprise it is today.

programme.title: Back Roads - Kandos, NSW
programme.desc: Back Roads journeys to Kandos, on the edge of the Great Dividing Range in New South Wales. This is a town famous for making cement, where Heather Ewart finds an unlikely arts festival is reshaping the community.

programme.title: Australia In Colour - Episode 4
programme.desc: Between 1960 and 1970 we see a Decade of Protest as the nation finds its voice. The Vietnam War is a hot button issue and inequality between black and white, and women and men, become mainstream issues.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 5
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 3
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Und - Personal Best
programme.desc: As cricket entered a new professional era, player development improved along with the quality of matches and this occasionally produced mind-blowing individual brilliance as well as entirely unexpected results.

programme.title: Compass - The Cult of The Saints
programme.desc: As 8-year-old diabetic Elizabeth Struhs lay dying, her parents and members of The Saints cult withheld life-saving insulin, believing God would heal her. Suzanne Smith investigates the manslaughter and community's reaction.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 5
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 16
programme.desc: All the news you need to start your day. Fauziah Ibrahim and Johanna Nicholson bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 5
programme.desc: Start your Sunday morning with the show the politicians rely on to find out what's going on. David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, joined by a panel of the best political analysts and commentators.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 4
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sportswriters, commentators and athletes examine the big issues, highlights and news in sport. For 20 years, Offsiders has been here to unpack all the action, both on and off the field.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 3
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 2
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 16
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 5
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Wash My Soul In The River's Flow
programme.desc: Kura Tungar-Songs from the River was a collaboration between First Nations singer-songwriters Archie Roach and Ruby Hunter working with Paul Grabowsky and the 22-piece Australian Art Orchestra.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Handcrafted
programme.desc: The art of making by hand is a timeless tradition that continues to shape the modern world. Meet designers who incorporate handcrafted practices in Jakarta, Bali, and Delhi.

programme.desc: Richard and Erin Sims start out building a farm-style lodge, however it balloons into a building of epic proportions, complete with three 'wings', seven-metre-high chimneys, and thousands of hand-picked dolerite stones.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan - Episode 4
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Malaysian Drug Mules
programme.desc: Follow the Royal Malaysian Police as they go in pursuit of sinister Nigerian gangs who deceive or coerce hundreds of Malaysian women into smuggling drugs.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A vibrant, social media savvy, 15-year-old girl goes missing in a small town, leaving the community perplexed to what happened.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man in Modesto was apprehended by a K9 unit while fleeing from police; another was arrested while his family dog was bleeding in their backyard.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: In Epping, New Hampshire, Sheila LaBarre was known as an eccentric widow who loved her rabbits. But her turbulent childhood, a coma-induced vision, and her husband's death sent Sheila on a mission to kill.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A convicted triple murderer battles with the judge during sentencing; a shirtless defendant fires his lawyer; a sleepy jailbird calls the judge her best friend; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: An accused sex offender masturbates in virtual court; a defendant begs the judge to let him go home to take care of his dog; a convicted murderer tells the judge to 'hurry up' during sentencing; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: After a man is gunned down at an after-hours club, investigators and the prosecutor are left with no witnesses willing to provide testimony, leaving the case hanging on the defendant's self-defence claim.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: When one of Redlands, California's newest residents goes missing, the distraught community bands together to help find her.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: The Wagners stand accused of murdering eight members of the Rhoden family over a bitter child custody dispute.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: When a man is lured into a deadly trap, detectives must turn the tables on the suspects before they strike again.

programme.desc: Travel blogger Carla Stefaniak went to Costa Rica to celebrate her 36th birthday. But when she was to arrive back home to Miami, her awaiting loved ones realised she never got on the plane.

programme.title: Grade 8 English

programme.desc: Know more about the volcanoes found in the Philippines, the factors that affect climate, the effects of changing climate, and how to adapt accordingly. Discover the relationship between the constellations in the sky and Earth's position along its orbit.

programme.title: Dans Les Bottes De Lucky Luke
programme.desc: Unlike many Hollywood films, the legend of Lucky Luke goes beyond an eternal face-off between cowboys and Indians. Mexican, Irish, Jewish, Italian, Chinese, Black and Cajun communities hold a special place in American history and the adventures of the lone cowboy.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: With the Art Deco movement now over a century old we look back at the exhibition ''Art Deco France/North America'' at the Cite de l'Architecture et du Patrimoine. The story of woad. All the expertise of the Joseph Duclos Manufacture Royale recounted by Ramesh Nair. Wearing clothes with wide shoulders.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Fontainebleau, the Musee des Peintres de Barbizon traces the history of Impressionism. A self-taught chef turned Michelin-starred chef, Guy Martin looks back on his gastronomic career at the Grand Vefour. Time travel with Chemena Kamali, at the helm of Chloe. The art of straw marquetry with Stephanie Trolez.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver
programme.desc: Every year, the regulars flock to take part in the Inferno de Mürren ski race. Simon and the Suppenalp team are on deck. For their first season at the Hollandia mountain hut, Christina and Joel are finding their feet. In the Grisons, Nicola is relieved to see her partner again.

programme.title: Bijoux : Eclats De Reves
programme.desc: How do you design a piece of jewellery? Hear from creators, artisans and artistic directors from major houses.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2

programme.title: Cotonou Comedy Club - Gala Mikwabo
programme.desc: Cotonou Comedy Club - Gala Mikwabo

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Aged 23, Valeriia Novikova left Russia to escape a restrictive society. She arrived in France thanks to an 'Au Pair' programme, decided to study languages and then did her 'coming out'. The young woman has created strong links with her host family and her community.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Christel Sadde creates moving sculptures. A trained graphic designer inspired by geometric abstraction and kinetic art, she has been exploring for over twenty years the poetic and aerial lightness of form.

programme.title: De Miel Et De Sang
programme.desc: Carel has returned to his native Provence. With his former high school friend, today head of the local police, he investigates the death of a man killed by being stung by dozens of bees. Gradually they uncover a horrific case from the past, one that had shaken the entire village.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: With the Art Deco movement now over a century old we look back at the exhibition ''Art Deco France/North America'' at the Cite de l'Architecture et du Patrimoine. The story of woad. All the expertise of the Joseph Duclos Manufacture Royale recounted by Ramesh Nair. Wearing clothes with wide shoulders.

programme.title: Le Prix Du Passage
programme.desc: Natacha, a single mother, is having trouble making ends meet. Walid, a migrant from Iraq, is also struggling to survive. He is trying to save enough money to pay for his passage to England. Exhausted but desperate for hope, they join forces to launch an amateurish channel of clandestine passengers.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Romeo and Juliet are forced by their parents to see the therapist. Like any self-respecting teenagers, they love each other intensely and try to prove their love in rather extreme ways.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: Bolivia, a country shaped by the Royal Cordillera, also home to the Uyuni Salt Flat, the largest salt desert in the world, the high-altitude Lake Titicaca and the lush Amazon rainforest. While these breathtaking landscapes attract hundreds of thousands of travelers, Bolivia proves to be a harsh land for amateur hikers.

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 7
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Kagat ng Dilim 2020 ep 10
programme.desc: REBOOT: Urban legends and urban horror stories set against a backdrop of modern-day events and headlines, terrifying tales told in mock-documentary style make up this groundbreaking original horror series.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 42
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 24
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7

Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?
